articles.title: Markets edge higher ahead of Budget, Gold hits record on trade tariff concerns
articles.description: Sensex opened higher at 76,888.89 and is currently trading at 77,006.86, up by 247.05 points; Nifty opened at 23,296.75 gaining 101.10 points
articles.content:
Indian equity markets opened higher on Thursday, with both benchmark indices extending gains for the third consecutive session amid cautious trading ahead of the Union Budget 2025.
